description:
Kotetsu Isane is http://anidb.net/ch9316 [Unohana]`s vice-captain in division four of the thirteen protection squads. She is fairly quiet and polite, and while she doesn`t have as much patience as her captain, Isane looks up to Unohana as a role model. Her zanpakutou is named Itegumo.
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Kotetsu Isane
